Notes: A controller that registers and keeps track of Silver Stars. If the player has collected all Silver Stars, it will spawn a Power Star. This requires an edit to the galaxy's Scenario file. The Silver Stars need to be linked to this object using Obj_ID (SMG1) or GeneratorId (SMG2). See StrayTico for the individual Silver Stars.

Obj_arg0.Name: Combine at Controller's Position?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, the Silver Stars will combine at this object's position. Otherwise, they will combine above the player.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after the Silver Stars combine.

DemoCast.Description: Makes the Power Star appear if 集めチコスター出現 action gets triggered.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Appears after the Silver Stars combine. If this is part of a cutscene, it will appear when the 集めチコスター出現 part gets executed.

Camera.Description: Used when the individual Silver Stars combine.
